trans-unit.source: Removes the fonts in the specified file from the system font table

seg-source.mrk: Removes the fonts in the specified file from the system font table

target.mrk: Removes the fonts in the specified file from the system font table

trans-unit.source: String that names a font resource file. To remove a font whose information comes from several resource

seg-source.mrk: String that names a font resource file.
To remove a font whose information comes from several resource

target.mrk: String that names a font resource file.
To remove a font whose information comes from several resource

trans-unit.source: files, they must be separated by a "|". For example, abcxxxxx.pfm|abcxxxxx.pfb.

seg-source.mrk: files, they must be separated by a "|".

target.mrk: files, they must be separated by a "|".

trans-unit.source: [optional] The characteristics of the font to be removed from the system. In order for the font to be removed, the flags

seg-source.mrk: The characteristics of the font to be removed from the system.
In order for the font to be removed, the flags

target.mrk: The characteristics of the font to be removed from the system.
In order for the font to be removed, the flags

trans-unit.source: used must be the same as when the font was added with the _WinAPI_AddFontResourceEx() function.

seg-source.mrk: used must be the same as when the font was added with the _WinAPI_AddFontResourceEx() function.

target.mrk: used must be the same as when the font was added with the _WinAPI_AddFontResourceEx() function.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether sends a WM_FONTCHANGE message, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether sends a WM_FONTCHANGE message, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether sends a WM_FONTCHANGE message, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - Send the WM_FONTCHANGE message to all top-level windows after changing the pool of font resources.

seg-source.mrk: True - Send the WM_FONTCHANGE message to all top-level windows after changing the pool of font resources.

target.mrk: True - Send the WM_FONTCHANGE message to all top-level windows after changing the pool of font resources.
